tasks.task_description: Initialize git repository and connect to GitHub
Create test.yml workflow for PR testing (unit, integration, load tests)
Create deploy.yml workflow for Cloud Run deployment (all 5 services)
Test the CI/CD pipeline with a sample commit

description: Phase 6 CI/CD Pipeline Implementation - GitHub Actions workflows for testing and deployment
context: Created GitHub Actions workflows: test.yml for PR testing (unit, integration, load tests with 80% coverage threshold) and deploy.yml for Cloud Run deployment of all 5 services to us-east1 region. Connected repository to GitHub remote.
